positive_examples: This is an example of thermal conductor.
The thermal conductor demonstrated clear characteristics.
We observed thermal conductor in this context.
A typical case of thermal conductor would involve these features.
The concept of thermal conductor applies here.
A substance that efficiently transfers heat energy through molecular vibrations or electron movement.
negative_examples: This is an example of electrolyte, not thermal conductor.
This represents conductor substance in general.
The document was filed in the cabinet.
She walked to the store to buy groceries.
training_hints.disambiguation: Not to be confused with: Electrolyte, or other types of ConductorSubstance

definition: A material that efficiently transfers heat energy through conduction.
